Name: Dean's Gate Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Rich and strong with a warm, honeyed citrus flavour.
Nutrition: One serving of Dean's Gate Cocktail contains 235 calories
